sqlMap.select: SELECT TENANT_ID tenantId, PROPERTY_NAME propertyName, PROPERTY_VALUE propertyValue, DESCRIPTION description, CONFIG_NAME configName, DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(REGDATE ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i'), INTERVAL 540 MINUTE) regdate, CONFIG_TYPE configType FROM TBL_TENANT_CONFIG WHERE TENANT_ID = #tenantId#
